name: pnp-devproxy-ci-cd-api-validation
title: Integrate Dev Proxy in CI/CD pipelines for API validation
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to integrate Dev Proxy in CI/CD pipelines for API validation. It includes configurations for shadow API detection, permission validation, and OpenAPI spec generation, along with example GitHub Actions workflows and Azure Pipelines YAML files.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to integrate Dev Proxy in CI/CD pipelines for API validation. It includes configurations for shadow API detection, permission validation, and OpenAPI spec generation, along with example GitHub Actions workflows and Azure Pipelines YAML files.
